page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In the Bulls Cross area many factories and industries are closing down or working short time. One incident occured recently atthe Thorn EMI factory. 500 people were made redundant including three of my Nan's friends. This was a particularly serious matter as there is limited employment in the area which is mostly Green Belt land, which means land that cannot be developed. In Britain, over 3.8 million people queue up to sign on at a job centre every week to collect their dole or Social Security money.
